meanings.definition: a small, edible fish found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen caught some butterfishes for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of butterfishes swimming near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The butterfishes were so tiny, they looked like swimming candies.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and inviting as a school of butterfishes.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the butterfishes glistened under the sunlight.
